page.title: 13SPORT ACTIVITIES IN B. HILL
page.content: The area lacks a major sports centre, but there are a number of sports clubs and grounds. Hockey and rugby are 2 of the most popular games. In summer they are replaced with cricket and tennis. The 2 man_made lakes in the River Roding valley provide good facilities for windsurfing , which is becoming more popular. Epping Forest is also popular with sportsmen. Horse riding is very common, either from a number of riding schools or from private yards. Riders do cause problems, however, by cutting up the ground and making it muddy in places. The Forest is also popular with walkers, joggers and naturalists. Other sports which are played in this area include bowls, football and lacrosse.
